title: Ticket #3199: defrag draining rate is too small
description:
Defrag drains at a steady rate per DEFRAG_INTERVAL. Since the desired rate of draining may not be an integral number of machines per interval, additional draining may be scheduled every hour and every day to compensate.

There is a bug that sometimes causes the hourly and daily draining corrections to drain too few machines.

The workaround is to set DEFRAG_INTERVAL so that DEFRAG_DRAINING_MACHINES_PER_HOUR*DEFRAG_INTERVAL/3600 is an integer.
